node.title: Debug device specific issues on your website - Remote debugging
node.excerpt: Fixing device specific issues using chrome device tooler, chrome remote debugging and online real device testing tool

node.title: Learn Hoisting in Javascript
node.excerpt: Hoisting is declaring all the functions and variable at the top of the program before execution.
